Data Delivery¶

Data Deliverer¶

Main class - Data Deliverer

Handles login of user, keeps track of data, uploads/downloads etc

class cli_code.data_deliverer.DataDeliverer(creds=None, username=None, password=None, project_id=None, project_owner=None, pathfile=None, data=None, break_on_fail=True, overwrite=False)¶

Bases: object

Instanstiates the delivery by logging the user into the Delivery System, checking the users access to the specified project, and uploads/downloads the data to the S3 storage.

Parameters

  • creds (str) – Path to file with user creds and project info

  • username (str) – User spec. username, None if creds used

  • password (str) – User spec. password, None if creds used

  • project_id (str) – User spec. project ID, None if creds used

  • project_owner (str) – User spec. project owner, None if creds used

  • pathfile (str) – Path to file containing file paths

  • data (tuple) – All paths to be uploaded/downloaded

  • break_on_fail (bool) – True if folder delivery should be cancelled on file fail

  • overwrite (bool) – True if deliver again - overwrite delivered files

break_on_fail¶

Cancel delivery on fail or not

Type

bool

overwrite¶

Overwrite already delivered files or not

Type

bool

logfile¶

Path to log file

Type

str

LOGGER¶

Logger - keeps track of bugs, info, errors etc

Type

Logger

method¶

Delivery method, put or get

Type

str

user¶

Data Delivery System user

Type

DSUser

project_id¶

Project ID to upload to/download from

Type

str

project_owner¶

Owner of the current project

Type

str

data¶

Paths and info to files

Type

dict

failed¶

Paths and info to failed files

Type

dict

bucketname¶

Name of S3 bucket to deliver to/from

Type

str

s3project¶

ID of S3 project containing buckets

Type

str

public¶

Project public key

Type

bytes

private¶

Project private key, b’’ if uploading

Type

bytes

TO_PRINT¶

Progress printout

Type

str

PROGRESS¶

Progress info on files # NOTE: put in data??

Type

dict

Raises

  • DeliverySystemException – Required info not found or access denied

  • OSError – Temporary directory failure

finalize_delivery(file: str, fileinfo: dict) → tuple¶

Finalizes delivery after download from s3: Decrypts, decompresses (if compressed in DS), and checks integrity.

Parameters

  • file (str) – Path to file

  • fileinfo (dict) – Information on file

Returns

Info on finalized file

bool: True if decryption etc successful str: Path to new, delivered and decrypted file str: Error message, “” if none

Return type

tuple

get(path: str, path_info: dict) -> (<class 'bool'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Downloads specified data from S3 bucket

Parameters

  • path (str) – File to be downloaded

  • path_info (dict) – Name of downloaded file

Returns

Info on download success

bool: True if downloaded str: Error message, “” if none

Return type

tuple

Raises

  • OSError – Creating directory failed

  • botocore.client.ClientError – Failed download

prep_upload(path: pathlib.Path, path_info: dict) → tuple¶

Prepares the files for upload.

Parameters

  • path (Path) – Path to file

  • path_info (dict) – Info on file

Returns

Info on success and info

bool: True if processing successful Path: Path to processed file int: Size of processed file bool: True if file compressed by the delivery system bytes: Public key needed for file decryption bytes: Salt needed for shared key derivation str: Error message, “” if none

Return type

tuple

put(file: pathlib.Path, fileinfo: dict) -> (<class 'bool'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Uploads specified data to the S3 bucket.

Parameters

  • file (Path) – Path to original file

  • fileinfo (dict) – Info on file

Returns

bool: True if upload successful str: Encrypted file, to upload str: Remote path, path in bucket str: Error message, “” if none

Return type

tuple

set_progress(item: pathlib.Path, processing: bool = False, upload: bool = False, download: bool = False, decryption: bool = False, db: bool = False, started: bool = False, finished: bool = False)¶

Set progress of file to in progress or finished, regarding the file checks, processing, upload or database.

Parameters

  • item (Path) – Path to file being handled

  • check (bool) – True if file checking in progress or finished

  • processing (bool) – True if processing in progress or finished

  • upload (bool) – True if upload in progress or finshed

  • db (bool) – True if database update in progress or finished

Raises

DataException – Data dictionary update failed

update_delivery(file: pathlib.Path, updinfo: dict) → bool¶

Updates data delivery information dictionary

Parameters

  • file (Path) – The files info to be updated

  • updinfo (dict) – The dictionary to update the info with

Returns

True if to continue with delivery

Return type

bool

Raises

DataException – Data dictionary update failed

exception cli_code.data_deliverer.DeliverySystemException¶

Bases: Exception

Errors regarding Delivery Portal access etc

cli_code.data_deliverer.update_progress_bar(file, status: str)¶

Update the status of the file - Waiting, Encrypting, Uploading, etc.

Parameters

  • file – File to update progress on

  • status (str) – Which stage the delivery is on

S3 Connection¶

S3 Connector

Communicates with and handles operations related to Safespring S3

class cli_code.s3_connector.S3Connector(bucketname, project)¶

Bases: object

Keeps information regarding the resource, project and bucket currently in use, and handles S3-related checks.

Parameters

  • bucketname – Name of bucket to access

  • project – S3 project to access

project¶

S3 project ID

bucketname¶

Name of bucket to access

bucket¶

Bucket object to access

resource¶

S3 connection object

session¶

Session - needed for multithreading/processing

delete_item(key: str)¶

Deletes specified item from S3 bucket

Parameters

key (str) – Item (e.g. file) to delete from bucket

Raises

S3Error – Error while deleting object

file_exists_in_bucket(key: str) -> (<class 'bool'>, <class 'str'>)¶

Checks if the current file already exists in the specified bucket. If so, the file will not be uploaded (put), or will be downloaded (get)

Parameters

  • key (str) – File to check for in bucket

  • put (bool) – True if uploading (default)

Returns

True if the file already exists, False if it doesnt str: Error message, “” if none

Return type

bool

Raises

botocore.exceptions.ClientError – Error in searching bucket. 404 -> OK, not 404 -> not OK
